title: Help, please!
content:
Having trouble identifying this font. Any help is greatly appreciated.

[http://i40.tinypic.com/9ga9hd.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829181511/http:/i40.tinypic.com/9ga9hd.png "http://i40.tinypic.com/9ga9hd.png")

Every time I try to upload the image here, it crashes. :/

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-09-27 at 10.05.56 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829181511/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-09-27%20at%2010.05.56%20AM_4.png) | 54.78 KB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content: Don't think it's a font as it, rather a customization of an existing font. They probably started with a sans, add those Latin (triangle) serifs and probably customized /V bottom. If you need to reproduce it, your best chance is probably to retrace it.
